author: paulsp
msg: o Fix - Bug 7142 - When password are saved encryped when encryption is enabled
o Fix - Bug 7142 - Users must enter their current password to change their password
o Fix - Password are correctly cased, based on JR.p JetspeedSecurity.caseinsensitive properites
o Fix - Username is no longer updatable in UserBrowser Edit and Delete screens
o Fix - JetspeedSecurity is used instead of TurbineSecurity when appropiate. Mainly everywhere other then JetspeedDBSecurityService
o Add - formReadOnlyText to GlobalMacro.vm for readonly field in a form
